plan-tree-compact-format.title: Compact line format
plan-tree-compact-format.description: Make each tree line horizontally compact to fit narrow terminals while remaining readable.
acceptanceCriteria: Line format minimizes extra spacing and columns.
Long fields are truncated or wrapped consistently.
Resulting layout is readable in small terminal widths.
plan-tree-compact-format.prompt: Adjust tree node text format to be compact; apply truncation or wrapping as needed for narrow terminals.

plan-tree-data-shape.title: Build task tree structure
plan-tree-data-shape.description: Derive a parent/child hierarchy from plan tasks for tree rendering, ensuring stable ordering.
acceptanceCriteria: Tree structure reflects parentId/childIds relationships correctly.
Ordering is stable and deterministic for siblings.
Missing/invalid parent references are handled gracefully (e.g., treated as roots).
plan-tree-data-shape.prompt: Create a hierarchy from plan tasks and define stable ordering for siblings; handle missing parents safely.

plan-tree-renderer.title: Render tree with lipgloss
plan-tree-renderer.description: Use lipgloss tree rendering to display the hierarchy with status labels and colors.
acceptanceCriteria: Tree uses lipgloss tree renderer for branches/indentation.
Each node shows task title plus status label with existing colors.
No loss of data compared to prior list view.
plan-tree-renderer.prompt: Render the task hierarchy with lipgloss tree; include status labels with existing color styles.

plan-tree-rendering.title: Tree render plan view
plan-tree-rendering.description: Render parent/child tasks as a compact tree in the plan tab using lipgloss tree rendering while preserving status colors.
acceptanceCriteria: Plan tab renders parent and child tasks as a visible tree with clear parent/child relationships.
Statuses and their colors remain intact in the tree output.
Rendering fits narrow terminals by keeping each line horizontally compact.
plan-tree-rendering.prompt: Implement tree rendering in the plan tab using lipgloss tree output and keep status coloring; keep the format compact for narrow terminals.
